body:
mplsviewer by Aki Hermann Barkarson, CCIE # 27552

Latest version: 0.5.2b (04.12.2012)

New features:

* Some basic regexp capability in search.
* VRF parser fixed for definition route-targets not under address-family.
* view-one-vrf.php updated for ipv4 only, ipv6 only and ipv4/ipv6.
* Added ipv6 support for view-one-device.php.
* Added HD vrf support to parser.
* Added HD vrf viewer support.

![Screenshot of VRF view:](https://raw.github.com/ahabcaptain/mplsviewer/master/screenshots/view-one-vrf.png)Large view: https://raw.github.com/ahabcaptain/mplsviewer/master/screenshots/view-one-vrf.png

Go to https://github.com/ahabcaptain/mplsviewer/downloads for the latest release.

Installation instructions are in the Wiki section.

Next up:
* Further clean-up the code, optimize.
* Move redundant code to functions.
* Add css support.
* Add RD values again, neatly(removed it in 0.4b).
* Add community management
* Add customer/contract table import from crm (ex, navision)

and more..
tagline: View mpls enabled devices, vrfs and their imported/exported communities. (rancid parsed to mysql with php front-end)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Mplsviewer
